channel.title: вДудь on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in вДудь on Rusland 1

item.title: Dmitry Markov (with an iPhone)
item.description: More photography at Artsy.net, A set of photographs by Dmitriy Markov (Pavel Kosenko, 2017), and via Markov’s own Instagram. Russia by Dmitry Markov (Дмитрий Марков, фото России) (MdMViktorViktor, 2020, 4 m) Дмитрий Марков - социальный работник с престижной премией Getty Instagram Grant (Time Art, 2019, 5 m)

item.title: Yury Dud’s Kolyma
item.description: Reviews More at New Russian Documentary Brings the Horrors of the Gulag to the YouTube Generation (Alexey Kovalev, tol.org 2019) and articles on Johnson’s Russia List and vsem.ru. Review by Veniamin Zima (a historian) on realnoevremya.com, in English and/or Russian.
